P.HT: Notification template for the exchange of information in relation to passport applications by e-money institutions using distributors

ROW.CELL: Host Member State in which e-money services are to be provided
Name of the competent authority of the home Member State
Date of receipt by the competent authority of the home Member State of the complete and accurate application from the e-money institution
Nature of the application (assessment of the competent authority of the home Member State)

CELL.P: ☐ Freedom to provide services, based on the following circumstances:

ROW.CELL: Head office address of the e-money institution
Unique identification number of the e-money institution in the format of the home Member State as specified in Annex I (where applicable)
Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) of the e-money institution (where available)
Home Member State authorisation number of the e-money institution (where applicable)
Contact person within the e-money institution
Email of the contact person within the e-money institution
Telephone number of the contact person within the e-money institution

NP.TXT: Unique identification number in the format of the Member State where the distributor is located as specified in Annex I (where applicable)
Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) of the distributor (where available)
Name, place and date of birth of legal representatives
Name, date and place of birth
Unique identification number in the format of the Member State where the distributor is located as specified in Annex I (where applicable)

ROW.CELL: Electronic money services to be provided by the distributor

Description of the internal control mechanisms that will be used by the e-money institution/distributor in order to comply with the obligations in relation to the prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing under Directive (EU) 2015/849.

CELL.P: In case of outsourcing of operational functions of e-money services:

NP.TXT: Name and address of the entity to which operational functions are to be outsourced
Contact details (email and telephone number) of a contact person within the entity to which operational functions are to be outsourced
Type and exhaustive description of the operational functions outsourced
